```{r setup}
library(airlinestats)
```

load test data and calculate airline marketshare for different airports

```{r}
data = dplyr::tibble(
    Origin=c("RDU", "RDU", "CLT", "CLT", "CLT"),
    OperatingCarrierName = c("Southwest", "Delta", "American", "American", "Piedmont"),
    Passengers=rep(1, 5)
)

biggest_market_share(data, Origin, OperatingCarrierName)
```
